title: Can Riot Fix the Leaver Buster Please?

replies.body:
This higher timer would only occur with a history of leaving, normally it's 5 minutes.  The lower priority queue is a good time to troubleshoot whatever is causing issues, and also very good at picking up a disconnection that would have otherwise been during the match.  

If you have issues causing you to leave, toss me some info and I'd be happy to help.  The suggestion to use the client is a good one, but you may want to give this suggestion direly to the client devs over at the [client boards](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion)!
